author: Staff Reporter
text: A 19-year-old youth was arrested on charges of breaking into a house and robbing gold jewels weighing 18 sovereigns. Police sources said they picked up Anthony, a resident of Ernavur, at Tondiarpet on Saturday. He was reportedly climbing down the staircase of a building with a bag in his hand when he was intercepted. He tried to flee, but was nabbed. The police also recovered silver articles, a laptop and cell phones.
title: Held for robbery
